title: [Bendigo Film Library with Tricia Nankervis and Ken McLoughlin]
brief_description: Outlines the services that are available at the Film Lending Library in Bendigo. Discusses topics of films available and how to obtain membership and also talks about libraries in Gippsland. Mention is made of “20,000 films down in Melbourne” (State Film Centre) and “can draw on the library in Canberra”. Interviews are conducted with Tricia Nankervis and Ken McLoughlin. Of historical value.
